title: Redeem Codes
body: So guys, i'm playing lol for about 2 months and i'm 30 level but i don't have so much skins. I usually play with lee sin or master yi and so on. Before half an hour i saw on youtube free skins and it's about redeem codes. I found one skin but i can't find that tab (Codes) inside the launcher. I used to use new launcher and there is no that tab and I switched to this I don't know how to call it maybe older version or i don't know. And there's also nothing. My question is: can I find that tab in launcher or it's been removed and is it legal?? Sorry for my English, i used to pass hahah. Hope you will answer as fast as you can ;)

replies.body: i want skt t1 zed plzzz
Hi , I very like playing nidalle and i have no skin... :( I really want headhunter nidalle plzz

> [{quoted}](name=CriMzaS,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aKfIobw6,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-11-09T17:45:26.068+0000)
>
> Hi , I very like playing nidalle and i have no skin... :( I really want headhunter nidalle plzz

I have challanger nidale but i dont like that champ :D

I'd recommend against looking for free RP or skin codes online unless it's one of the promotions we run. A lot of the sites that advertise free RP or content will attempt to hijack your account by pretending to be a legitimate Riot site and asking for your login details. You can redeem codes inside either client from inside the store. Hit the *Purchase RP* button, then select the "Prepaid Cards & Codes" payment method before entering your code to redeem the content.

Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aKfIobw6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-13T22:17:06.188+0000)
>
> I'd recommend against looking for free RP or skin codes online unless it's one of the promotions we run. A lot of the sites that advertise free RP or content will attempt to hijack your account by pretending to be a legitimate Riot site and asking for your login details. You can redeem codes inside either client from inside the store. Hit the *Purchase RP* button, then select the "Prepaid Cards & Codes" payment method before entering your code to redeem the content.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^

Thank you so much, i found it :D
